text.text:
We have advanced the expiration date for the following grants due to inactivity since `{{.start_date}}`:{{ range .dormant_grants }}
>*ID*: `{{.id}}`
>*Account ID*: `{{.account_id}}`
>*Resource*: `{{.resource.urn}}` ({{.resource.provider_type}} {{.resource.type}})
>*Role*: `{{.role}}`
>*Expiration Date* (new): `{{.expiration_date}}`
{{end}}
